thread.title_full: One day business trip in Beijing - Review of Crowne Plaza Beijing Wangfujing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: hwahl2016
title: One day business trip in Beijing -
text:
The crowna plaza from Beijing Wangfujing is a classical place for european people. The employees speak english, the room is nice, bathroom is big, the bed is good.
The price of the breakfast is high, but you can go on the other side of the street to have a cheaper one.
Room Tip: Do not hesitate to go to massage , on the other side of the street. See more room tips
